mean_cn: n. （公司等的）清理，清算，（债务的）清偿，了结；  v. 破坏，毁灭，杀掉
mean_en: termination of a business operation by using its assets to discharge its liabilities
sentence: The boss watched in despair as his company went into liquidation.
sentence_trans: 老板绝望地看着他的公司清算的过程。
word_etyma: liquid=liqu湿 + ation名词后缀 → 流动 → liquidation液化
